Iteration 1

  • Change heading to related (hypothesis: there are too many places currently to put related links, users are overwhelmed)
  • Changed heading to bold
  • Removed border
  • Made links consistent with search results
  • Made links more consistent with Visual (e.g. add content type and description)
  • Made more consistent with the way business areas add related links to content area (e.g. add descriptive content)

    Calculator  |  Released on 26 June 2017

    Workers have started to feel the squeeze in their finances, after wage growth recently fell below inflation for the first time since 2014.

  • How do earnings vary across Great Britain?

    Interactive  |  Released on 15 January 2015

    Did you know that full-time employees in the UK earned £528 per week on average in 2015, and that on average women earned 9.4% less than men per hour?
